author: Luke Lee
description: All-in-One Presence Detection System - combines WiFi MQTT detection, GPS geofencing, Anyone logic, manual override, and delayed away in a single driver
releaseNotes: Version 0.1.0 - Major update with WiFi MQTT presence detection and GPS geofencing integration. Features separate state tracking for WiFi (connected/disconnected) and GPS (entered/exited), sophisticated presence logic where WiFi connection triggers immediate presence and GPS only affects presence when WiFi is disconnected. Includes heartbeat timeout monitoring, MAC address normalization, and state recovery functionality.
